26#include <sys/cdefs.h>
27__KERNEL_RCSID(0, "$NetBSD: nouveau_nvkm_subdev_fb_ramnv1a.c,v 1.2 2018/08/27 04:58:33 riastradh Exp $");
28
29#include "ram.h"
30
31int
32nv1a_ram_new(struct nvkm_fb *fb, struct nvkm_ram **pram)
33{
34 struct pci_dev *bridge;
35 u32 mem, mib;
36
37 bridge = pci_get_bus_and_slot(0, PCI_DEVFN(0, 1));
38 if (!bridge) {
39 nvkm_error(&fb->subdev, "no bridge device\n");
40 return -ENODEV;
41 }
42
43 if (fb->subdev.device->chipset == 0x1a) {
44 pci_read_config_dword(bridge, 0x7c, &mem);
45 mib = ((mem >> 6) & 31) + 1;
46 } else {
47 pci_read_config_dword(bridge, 0x84, &mem);
48 mib = ((mem >> 4) & 127) + 1;
49 }
50
51 return nvkm_ram_new_(&nv04_ram_func, fb, NVKM_RAM_TYPE_STOLEN,
52 mib * 1024 * 1024, 0, pram);
53}
54
